scripts.deploy: graph deploy --node https://api.studio.thegraph.com/deploy/ Bored Ape Yacht Club

scripts.deploy-local: graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 Bored Ape Yacht Club
